comment: Professor Nikitin was the best professor I have ever had. I was having a really rough time throughout the semester in my personal life and his class helped me so much. He really cares about his students and does his best to make sure everyone in the class succeeds. He is amazing take his class!!!
A very informative class. I learned a lot and feel very lucky to have had professor Nikitin as an instructor.
Keith was very knowledgeable, and enthusiastic about the material covered in this Health and Wellness course. I certainly would recommend this professor, and his course to others.

He cares about his students a lot. He makes you want to take our health seriously. I did not have any interest in wellness but he gives his students motivation. He tries his best to help. Attendance is mandatory but he is a decent lecturer. As long as you do the modules you will be fine. No tests only modules which is pretty neat.

Would definitely recommend him for anyone taking WELL1000! Even though the course is a requirement, he loves his job and his class and it shows. Regardless of any problem you're going through he will take the time to personalize with you. Almost all of the course work is online, which if you avoid procrastinating on it the class is an easy A.

Mr. Nikitin is the most caring professor I had this semester. I didnt even mind that the attendance was mandatory and that it was a night class. He genuinely cares about our wellbeing and living a healthy life. I loved listening to his lectures that were only once a week. The other day you go to the gym and can work out any way you want! Take him!

He wants every person he meets to live a healthy lifestyle and to enjoy life. Study the practice exams and you will pass every test. Lecture 1 day and gym another. Do not let them gym fool you it is not as scary as it seems. Not only did I lose weight, I also learned how to better care for myself and those I care about. He will change your life!

He is a great professor. If you participate you will pass the class. He does bump your grade up if you participate and you are a few points away from the next letter grade. He genuinely cares for the students and his main goal is to actually learn something from the class that you can apply in you life. TAKE HIM!! HE IS AWESOME
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Would take again

comment: This class is an overall easy A. Dr. Nikitin is engaging though. Lectures have nothing to do with tests since those are preset and online (do the review quizzes and you'll ace the 2 tests), so more like life lessons. Wednesdays are spent at the gym for credit so I would recommend him for a break of pace from all lecture classes
The sweetest guy. Class is pretty boring but you enjoy it because its him.

Keith did a great job for a class that very few people want to take.  Each lecture was interesting, attendance was taken, and the class was able to get involved.  Every other day we went to the Rec Center and were encouraged to try new things; swim, rock climb, play racquetball, etc.  The class was simple and straight forward.  Take him!

Biggest waste of time in the class, attendance shouldn't be mandatory for such a boring class that has nothing to do with someone's degree. He doesn't warn up about any upcoming assignments and and doesn't know how to teach and drags on his classes too long.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: He is passionate about what he's teaching. Everyone week there is one lecture and one class where you just go to the recreation center. There are modules with a few assignments due every few weeks. It can be a but much, but it's not hard stuff at all. All the assignments are online and he does take late work for half credit. Definitely recommend!

He is overral a great professor. He makes you think deeper into your emotional and physical lifestyle. He doesn't give any tests, but u do have to complete easy quizzes by the end of the semester. You have a couple of easy assignments due online by the end of every 2-3 weeks. On the second day of class that week he has class at the gym.
The professor is very nice. The class is an easy A as long as you do all of the homework and quizzes that are online.

He is seriously such a nice guy- one of the best professors I've ever taken. He is super laid back and wants to see everyone do well not only in class but in life. He makes everything as clear as possible, and does make anything difficult. All work is online. Easy A.

Professor Nikitin was one of the best professors I have had. His lectures were great and inspiring. I took an 8pm-9:15pm class after working all day and I felt impelled to stay and talk with him about how his lectures pertained to my life. Great guy and an even better teacher. Thanks Keith!

Attendance is not mandatory, always the most important part of any class. Lectures are about the material but he often goes on about his personal life, wasting time in class which is great. All of the assignments are online.

AWESOME TEACHER. Best class i've taken. Material is ofcourse easy but he is great. Gives you all the notes and tests are just like the notes. It's broken down into sections and he tells a lot of great stories. My favorite teacher at KSU.

He is an excellent teacher.He keeps you interested with his stories throughout the year which all relate to what he's teaching that day. He is vary caring about his classes. I would definitely take his class again if I could. I highly recommend him!!
He's great!
Loved the class and loved the teacher!  Class was interesting and I learned a lot.  Prof was very passionate about his class and made it fun.  Would take this teacher again if I could.
He does a very good job of teaching this class.  He tells a lot of stories to try and help excite the class.  The material itself is not very exciting but he teaches it well.
he is very boring and all his stories didn't keep me from falling asleep. Yawn. his tests are also a little tricky - the material is easy but he tries to make it hard with trick questions.
Great teacher and person. You'll end up learning a lot in this class. He tries really hard to make the most of it, make it interesting and useful.
